description: The Tenebrarum Empire is a large empire in Europe, encompassing much of the Mediterranean and extending into parts of Asia.  It appears to be the dominant power in the provided map.
title: Tenebrarum Empire

description: Ribe is a small kingdom located in Northern Europe; its location suggests it may be part of a larger political entity such as Northumbria.
title: Ribe

description: Northumbria was a powerful Anglo-Saxon kingdom in Northern England.  In this map, it appears to be relatively small and not the main focus.
title: Northumbria

description: The Seaxland is another Anglo-Saxon kingdom, in southeastern England. It is not the largest or most powerful entity on the map.
title: Seaxoland

description: Mercia was a powerful Anglo-Saxon kingdom in central England. In this representation, it is a relatively smaller power.
title: Mercia

description: Sussex was an Anglo-Saxon kingdom in Southern England. It is of small size on the map.
title: Sussex

description: Welsh Kingdom is a region in Western Britain.  It's a smaller kingdom compared to others on the map.

title: Exeter
